## SnapTurnController.tick() method

Must be called periodically.

**Signature:**

```typescript
tick(axes: number[] | ReadonlyArray<number>): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  axes | number\[\] \| ReadonlyArray&lt;number&gt; | [Gamepad.axes](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/Gamepad/axes) |

**Returns:**

void

## Example


```ts
renderer.setAnimationLoop(() => {
  snapTurnController.tick(leftGamepad.axes);
});
```
or

```ts
setInterval(() => {
  snapTurnController.tick(leftGamepad.axes);
}, anything);
```
